They consent to public, non-commercial access to their work

sections.title: Section 3 — Repository Inclusion
sections.content: Contributors acknowledge and accept that their work may be indexed, archived, and displayed within The Thesis Vault as part of a public academic library.

sections.title: Section 4 — User Responsibility
sections.content: Users accessing this platform agree to:
list: Use the content for academic, educational, or research purposes only
Properly cite authors when referencing materials
Refrain from unauthorized commercial use or redistribution

sections.title: Section 5 — Limitation of Liability
sections.content: The platform administrator does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or suitability of the published content and bears no responsibility for misuse.
